message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1500000. Considering its significance and the potential it holds for you, I would like to extend an exclusive offer. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $1200000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and aligns closely with your valuation of the product. I believe this price not only offers a substantial saving but also ensures a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
